description:
Download slides here: http://tinyurl.com/pfwosct

Learn what's happening with Zend Development tools: Zend Studio, Zend Guard, Z-Ray and Zend Server for Development; the new features, the features we are working on, and more importantly the ecosystem that comes along with it. Learn also how you can be part of the development process. Hear directly from members of the DevTools team.

title: Zend Tools Ecosystem Session @ZendCon 2015 - Download Slides
